definition.name: Progress
definition.description: A progress bar component that visually represents the completion or loading status of an operation. Built on top of Radix UI's Progress primitive, this component provides a customizable progress indicator that smoothly animates as the value changes.

value.description: The current progress value between 0 and 100

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the progress bar

interactions: The progress bar automatically animates when the value prop changes
definition.visualLayout: A horizontal bar with a rounded full background that fills from left to right based on the provided value. The filled portion uses the primary color while the background uses a transparent version of the primary color.
definition.implementationNotes: The component uses Radix UI's Progress primitive for accessibility and combines it with Tailwind CSS for styling. The progress indicator's position is controlled through CSS transform, translating it based on the inverse of the current value.
